name: (Cole)

Weapon1.PrimaryD: High firerate low damage, each hit leaves mark on target slowing them by 1%.
Weapon1.SecondaryD: High firerate low damage, each hit leaves mark on target decreasing their max health by 1%.

Ability1D: Removes all suckers in enemies and provides a movespeed and shield to all nearby allies based on the number of suckers.
Ability2D: A projectile stun, if it hits get a movespeed and attack speed buff for a short time.
PassiveD: Allies nearby heal and deal increased damage, this effect increases with stacks of ego. When hitting an enemy gain stacks of ego that constantly decay.
UltimateD: Immediately max aura stacks. weapon shoots faster, deals more damage and has unlimited ammo. gain a shield. Potency of debuffs increased. Yoink does not consume suckers while active.
